resources.string: You guessed the word! Good job!
Sorry, you didn\'t get the word right.\nThe correct word is \"%1$s\".
Guess the Wordle in 6 tries. Each guess must be a valid 5-letter word. The color of the tiles will change to show how close your guess was to the word.
P is in the word and in the correct spot.
L is in the word but in the wrong spot.
C is not in the word in any spot.

You have been successfully recruited by
Dr. Nemur and Dr. Strauss
for their mysterious study.

Good luck!

Dr. Strauss and Dr. Nemur scoff and leave you.
You watch as they approach your friend, who solves
the Wordle in 1 try. As the two neuroscientists
usher her to the door, you notice them glancing
nervously at the men's room.

Five minutes later, her partner walks out from the room,
looking around in confusion.
